architectureStyle.description: Ostentatious commercial architecture - designed to display wealth and generate profit
keyElements: GOLD, ORANGE, BRONZE everywhere - wealth must be visible
Large ear motifs in architectural details
Vault doors and secure storage prominently featured
Rules of Acquisition displayed on walls
Price tags visible even on building decorations
